persName.term: Alternate Personal Name, Previously Used Name

person.note: Zhao(1) Tingmei [3211] This is the Weiwang, Taizong and Taizi's younger brother. The burial grounds for his descendants was Ruzhou, Liangxian (see Murong Yanfeng's funerary inscriptions for Shuguan [14656], Shugui [14655], Kegao [14653], Shudang [14661], Shuzun [14659], Shuzhi [14660], etc. CBD, 4, 3485.

desc.label: 罷開封尹 授西京留守 會趙普再相 廉得盧多遜與廷美交通事 帝怒
